div.p: Intepretation of OncotypeDX DCIS (Ductal Carcinoma In Situ) Recurrence Score

publisher.value: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative

description.value: Intepretation of OncotypeDX DCIS (Ductal Carcinoma In Situ) Recurrence Score

display.value: Recurrence Score lower than 38: The cancer has a low risk of recurrence. The benefit of chemotherapy is likely to be small and will not outweigh the risks of side effects.

definition.value: Recurrence Score lower than 38: The cancer has a low risk of recurrence. The benefit of chemotherapy is likely to be small and will not outweigh the risks of side effects.

display.value: Recurrence Score of 39 up to and including 54: The cancer has an intermediate risk of recurrence. It’s unclear whether the benefits of chemotherapy outweigh the risks of side effects.

definition.value: Recurrence Score of 39 up to and including 54: The cancer has an intermediate risk of recurrence. It’s unclear whether the benefits of chemotherapy outweigh the risks of side effects.

display.value: Recurrence Score greater than or equal to 55: The cancer has a high risk of recurrence, and the benefits of chemotherapy are likely to be greater than the risks of side effects.

definition.value: Recurrence Score greater than or equal to 55: The cancer has a high risk of recurrence, and the benefits of chemotherapy are likely to be greater than the risks of side effects.
